description: The Thales Ka Band connectivity system provides the aircraft with satellite internet connectivity and a wireless local area network (LAN). This Engineering Authorization (EA) provides Maintenance with instructions to remove the Thales Ka system from the aircraft listed in this EA's effectivity. T
justification: Remove Thales Ka (Gen 1) switches from the P5 overhead panel.
parts_json: [{"part":"MS24658-23D","desc":"'KA POWER ON/OFF' and 'KA GND TX ENABLE OVERRIDE/NORMAL'","type":"Remove","qty":"2"},{"part":"BACP20B43B","desc":"Plug","type":"Add","qty":"2"}]
instructions_json:
[{"instruction":"P5 Panel Demodification
If not already done, remove power from the simulator
Gain access to the flight deck area P5 panel
Cover the P5 panel and simulator wiring
Cover the P8 and P9 panel","notes":""},{"instruction":"Remove the two (2) Thales Ka switches, 'KA POWER ON/OFF' and 'KA GND TX ENABLE OVERRIDE/NORMAL' (both P/N: MS24658-23D) from the P5 panel. Reference Thales drawing 187354, Sheet 5 (Detail E), Note 51.","notes":""},{"instruction":"Install two (2) plugs (P/N: P/N BACP20B43B), one in each hole, in accordance with Thales drawing 187354, Sheet 5 (Detail E).","notes":""},{"instruction":"Remove placards 'S9618' and 'S9619' from the AFT side of the P5 panel, if existing.","notes":""},{"instruction":"Remove placards 'KA SYSTEM CONTROL ON/OFF' and 'KA GND TX ENABLE OVERRIDE/NORMAL' from the front side of the P5 panel. Clean any placard residue from the area per BAC 5750 (or equivalent).","notes":""},{"instruction":"This EA also removes the circuit breakers from P6-1 and P6-4, but those breakers will be changed during the installation of the SatLink system.","notes":""}]
